Time-Based Follow ups that are created at specific intervals throughout the year, as long as the prospect remains in Quoting

rules.fullName: Last Chance to Offer Extended Warranty Barrie
rules.description: This task goes out at the 3 year mark, notifying the Business Manager to call the customer to inform them their warranty is about to expire and to offer them extended warranty

rules.fullName: Last Chance to Offer Extended Warranty Whitefish
rules.description: This task goes out at the 3 year mark, notifying the Business Manager to call the customer to inform them their warranty is about to expire and to offer them extended warranty

tasks.description: This deal has been tagged. Please call the customer to offer any add-on options before creating the Work Order.

tasks.description: Now that a week has passed since the customer picked up their boat, please check the On-Boarding Survey results to see if they posted and then give them a call to see how they're enjoying their boat/how the orientation was
tasks.subject: Brandon Customer Satisfaction Call

tasks.description: Please call the customer to reconfirm their pickup date and to see if they have any last minute questions regarding their boat or orientation. Thank you!

tasks.description: Once the deal is approved, please change the stage to "Business Office Approval Pending"

tasks.description: Please email customer the Water is Calling email to confirm pickup date

tasks.description: Please call the customer to reconfirm their pickup date and to see if they have any last minute questions regarding their boat or orientation. Thank you!

tasks.description: Now that a week has passed since the customer picked up their boat, please check the On-Boarding Survey results to see if they posted and then give them a call to see how they're enjoying their boat/how the orientation was

tasks.description: Please call the customer to offer additional parts and accessories before creating the Work Order
tasks.subject: Dominic Orientation Specialist Add On Call

tasks.description: This customer stated that they were not interested in buying at the particular time you spoke to them but showed interest for the future. They have since been part of a marketing drip campaign to keep them in the loop. A personal follow up is recommended
tasks.subject: Follow up with Nurturing Lead

tasks.description: This deal has been Sales Manager approved. Call the customer to congratulate them and address any outstanding questions.

tasks.description: This customer's package is now pending tagging. Please call your customer to offer popular add-on options before the Work Order is created.
tasks.subject: Salesperson Add-On Call
